title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and fry in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper.
When pasta is cooked, reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain.
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly pour egg mixture over pasta and toss vigorously to create a creamy sauce.
Add pasta water as needed to achieve desired consistency.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion until golden.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add remaining spices and canned tomatoes, simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend the sauce until smooth, then return to pan.
Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in crispy taco shells topped with fresh vegetables and cheese.
instructions: Brown the ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water as directed.
Simmer for 5 minutes until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve immediately with lime wedges on the side.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce with garlic and ginger.
instructions: Prepare all vegetables and set aside.
Mix soy sauce and sesame oil in a small bowl.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli and carrots first, stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add remaining vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes.
Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to coat.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A decadent chocolate dessert with a warm, gooey molten center.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Melt chocolate and butter together in a double boiler.
Whisk eggs, egg yolks, and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold melted chocolate into egg mixture.
Gently fold in flour until just combined.
Grease 4 ramekins with butter and dust with cocoa powder.
Divide batter among ramekins.
Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are firm but center is soft.
Let cool for 1 minute, then invert onto plates.
Serve immediately with vanilla ice cream.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese with olive oil dressing.
instructions: Cut cucumbers and tomatoes into large chunks.
Slice red onion into thin rings.
Combine vegetables in a large bowl.
Add olives and cubed feta cheese.
Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Let sit for 10 minutes to allow flavors to meld.
Serve at room temperature.
